item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 05 Dec 2023
item.description:
1. Highlexer
  2. Video Tutorial: How to Install OCaml on Linux and macOS!
  3. Eio TUI chat server and client demo
  4. dune.3.12.1
  5. OCaml Platform Newsletter: October 2023
  6. Advent of Code project template
  7. opam-health-check-ng 0.1.0: check the health of an opam repository on your home machine
  8. First release candidate of OCaml 5.1.1
  9. Compositional Automated Verification for OCaml
  10. OCaml and OPAM awarded The Open Science Award for Free and Open-Source Research Softwares
  11. ICFP 2023 OCaml Presentations on YouTube
  12. geojson and geojsone
  13. Rethinking abstract module types - feedback wanted
  14. TSan support in OCaml 5.1 and blog post
  15. Hilite 0.3.0
  16. You Can Attend the New OCaml.org Community Meetings
  17. A December update from the ocaml-wasm organisation
  18. Other OCaml News
